Amy Gori

The Center Cannot Hold

Who

I've been playing around with html and css since the days of Netscape. For my next act, I'm trying to become a Front End Engineering Ninja.

I went to grad school at UNC Chapel Hill, where I studied Renaissance literature and wrote about creativity, science, and the occult in the seventeenth century.

I'm originally from New York City and now living in rural Orange County. I have two kids, a daughter who's two and a son who's five, and they are insane and awesome. Insanely awesome.
